properties.areaDesc: Escambia, FL; Santa Rosa, FL; Baldwin, AL
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 13 at 3:14AM CST until January 13 at 6:15AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Southeastern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama...
Central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida...
South central Escambia County in northwestern Florida...

* Until 615 AM CST.

* At 312 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated showers and thunderstorms
producing heavy rainfall across the advisory area. Radar estimates
that 2 to 3 inches of rain has fallen across some locations from
near Lillian to Gonzalez to Milton. Excessive runoff from heavy
rainfall may cause minor flooding of urban and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Ferry Pass, Brent, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Goulding,
Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Molino, Perdido Beach, Point Baker,
Pea Ridge, Roeville and Floridatown.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
